title: Wild! Weird! Wanted! Teenage Monster (1957) Colorized | Sci-Fi, Western | Cult Film, subtitles

sources.title: Wild! Weird! Wanted! Teenage Monster (1957) Colorized | Sci-Fi, Western | Cult Film, subtitles
sources.description:
A teenage titan of terror on a lustful binge that paralyzed a town with fear! 
A young Charlie Cannon  is exposed to mysterious rays emanating from a meteorite, causing him to turn into an old, hairy, ugly, killing monster.  The town believes him dead, while his mother, a gold prospector named Ruth, hides him locked in the house.
